response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional piece is not just a product; it's an investment in innovation and excellence. I understand that the true value of this product might be subjective and varies from person to person. With that in mind, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure such a high-quality item at a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 850000}
